attributes.action: Make medical marijuana legal for medical use  and medical marijuana shops
attributes.background: Medical marijuana can really help people who are ill, , dying , have chronic or major pain, it can also helpcancer and aids patients and also people with depression , , anxiety, bi polar and so on  it would also help the economy alot in the long run

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104867 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
